definitions.text: weedy annual grass often occurs in grainfields and other cultivated land; seeds sometimes considered poisonous
weedy annual native to Europe but widely distributed as a weed especially in wheat
someone who leads you to believe something that is not true
the act of swindling by some fraudulent scheme
a deception for profit to yourself
deprive somebody of something by deceit
examples: The con-man beat me out of $50
we were cheated by their clever-sounding scheme
They chiseled me out of my money

definitions.text: defeat someone through trickery or deceit
engage in deceitful behavior; practice trickery or fraud
be sexually unfaithful to one's partner in marriage
